thread.title: Cargill Buys Norwegian Fish-Feed Producer EWOS for $1.5 billion - WSJ
thread.title_full: Cargill Buys Norwegian Fish-Feed Producer EWOS for $1.5 billion - WSJ

author: Dominic Chopping
title: Cargill Buys Norwegian Fish-Feed Producer EWOS for $1.5 billion - WSJ
text:
Agricultural conglomerate Cargill Inc. has bought Norwegian fish feed producer EWOS for €1.35 billion ($1.49 billion), as it continues to broaden its presence in the aquaculture industry, it said on Monday.
“This transaction, which is significant and the second aquaculture acquisition Cargill has announced in as many months, is…evidence of our... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
